name: Hermitage
description: A sacred site of worship and reflection; adventurers might receive blessings, research lore, or clash with zealots.
atmosphere: The hermitage has a peaceful, contemplative atmosphere with the scent of incense and the subtle fragrance of spiritual devotion. The air carries the weight of religious solitude and the mysteries of divine connection, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of spiritual enlightenment and the pursuit of inner peace.
